targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "soc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement"])

panels.description: Estimated time remaining until battery is empty

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "time_remaining")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement"])

panels.title: Time Remaining

panels.description: Battery voltage as measured by MPPT 1

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.mppt == "1")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement", "mppt"])

panels.title: Battery Voltage (MPPT 1)

panels.description: Battery voltage as measured by MPPT 2

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.mppt == "2")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement", "mppt"])

panels.title: Battery Voltage (MPPT 2)

panels.description: Battery voltage and current from shunt over time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement"])
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Voltage")

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "Solar_Monitor")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "location", "_measurement"])
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Current")

panels.title: Battery Shunt - Voltage & Current Trend
